1.title: Marisa y Nicole empiezan una nueva vida
1.plot: Marisa and Nicole's lives change forever once they arrive in the city, where Nicole desperately hopes to meet her father. For the third time, Marbella's superstitions interfere with her plans to marry Ezequiel.

2.title: Miky se gana la confianza de Marisa
2.plot: Miky defends Marisa after a car accident, which leads her to trust him to drive Nicole to school. Marcelo confesses to Marisa that he has been looking for her despite how they left things in their relationship.

3.title: Marisa finge ser novia de Miky
3.plot: Nicole begins to search for her father. When Marcelo finds out Marisa has a daughter, she pretends to be in a relationship with Miky to keep him from pursuing her.

4.title: Marisa tiene una nueva rival, Amaranta
4.plot: Nicole talks to Miky about her plans to find her father. Amaranta becomes jealous of Marisa after Marcelo shows a preference for her. Jenny breaks up with Miky.

5.title: ¡Marcelo es el papá de Nicole!
5.plot: Marisa admits to her mother that Marcelo is Nicole's father, but asks her to keep it a secret to avoid him trying to take custody. Miky doesn't want to lose Jenny and proposes to her.

6.title: Nicole piensa que su papá es Miky
6.plot: Lesly breaks up with Tino. Marisa's lie spins out of control, leading Nicole to believe Miky is her father. Marcelo finds out that Miky is engaged to another woman.

7.title: Jenny no quiere ver a Marisa cerca de Miky
7.plot: Marisa doesn't dare tell Marcelo anything about Nicole's father. Jenny is sure Miky has feelings for Marisa and asks him to stop seeing her. Marisa runs the risk of losing her daughter.

8.title: Jenny se enfrenta a Marisa
8.plot: Jenny causes a scandal for Marisa by demanding an explanation for why she won't leave her boyfriend alone. Lorenza is tired of Tadeo's promises and asks for a divorce.

9.title: Jeny está a punto de perder el amor de Miky
9.plot: Tadeo has a plan to win back his wife. When Jenny becomes increasingly jealous and controlling, Miky asks for time to think things over. Marisa resigns because she wants to return to Villahermosa.

10.title: Miky le pide a Marisa que no se vaya
10.plot: Amaranta blackmails Marcelo because her best friend Eva died under suspicious circumstances involving him. Marisa visits Miky to tell him goodbye, but can't resist kissing him.

11.title: Jenny le pide ayuda a Marcelo
11.plot: Lesly is about to get back together with Tino. Jenny asks Marcelo to help her get Marisa away from Miky. Amanda intends to be like a mother to Ezequiel's children.

12.title: Marisa le confiesa su secreto a Miky
12.plot: Lorenza feels betrayed by Tadeo after finding out all the change he made was just a plot he concocted with Brayan. Marisa reveals to Miky that Marcelo is Nicole's father and she is not willing to share her daughter.

13.title: Marcelo descubre que Nicole es su hija
13.plot: Marisa can no longer keep up the lie and finally tells Marcelo that Nicole is his daughter. Jenny and Miky decide to move forward with their wedding.

14.title: Marcelo no permitirá que Marisa lo aleje de Nicole
14.plot: Ezequiel is officially Amanda's boyfriend, but the kids don't accept the relationship. Marisa postpones leaving town when Marcelo threatens to exercise his rights as Nicole's father.

15.title: Marisa debe comprobar que Nicole es hija de Marcelo
15.plot: Lorenza vows not to return home until Tadeo finds a job and takes responsibility for his family. Marcelo needs to be sure that Nicole is his daughter, and asks Marisa for a DNA test.

16.title: Nicole se entera que Marcelo es su papá
16.plot: Marcelo confirms that Nicole is his daughter, meanwhile Marisa is afraid to admit to Nicole that her father has already arrived and wants to be part of her life. Jenny is sure Marisa is in love with Miky.

17.title: Marcelo no es el papá que Nicole imaginaba
17.plot: Jenny confirms that Miky likes Marisa. Nicole accepts that Marcelo is not the father she dreamed about, since she expected someone more like Miky. Marcelo wants to make up for lost time with his daughter.

18.title: Miky acepta que está enamorado de Marisa
18.plot: Marcelo wants to get to know Nicole and have her share his last name. Miky is upset that Nicole seems so happy with her parents, and finally admits to Jenny that he is in love with Marisa.

19.title: Miky pierde la memoria
19.plot: Miky falls unconscious after Jenny hits him. When Miky arrives at the hospital, he wakes up without his memory. Marbella asks Marisa to leave Miky alone.

20.title: Marisa le confiesa su amor a Miky
20.plot: Marisa intends to stay away from Miky for the greater good, but he confesses that he cannot stop thinking about her. Jenny advises Marcelo to keep Nicole away from Miky.

21.title: Miky se enfrenta con Marcelo
21.plot: Amanda and Ezquiel become engaged. Marcelo wants to take Nicole to school, but Marisa does not allow it and Miky decides to confront Marcelo about it. Tadeo wants to leave the house.

22.title: Nicole no acepta que Marcelo sea su papá
22.plot: Bruno finds out Paulina cheated, leaving Lesly living like a queen. Marcelo makes a pact with Marisa that they will do their best to get along. Nicole asks Miky to come with her to a father-daughter school dance.

23.title: Jenny quiere tener un hijo de Miky
23.plot: Marcelo is furious when he finds out that Nicole wants Miky to come with her to a Father-Daughter dance. Simona no longer wants to be Paulina's friend. Jenny talks to Miky about having children together.

24.title: Amaranta planea alejar Marisa de Marcelo
24.plot: Amanda reports Marbella so she will be fined for selling her cakes. Amaranta wants to destroy Marisa, starting with forcing her to away from Marcelo. Marisa confesses to Lorenza that Miky loves her.

25.title: Miky le confiesa a Jenny su amor por Marisa
25.plot: Miky tells Jenny face-to-face that Marisa is more important to him than he ever expected. Ezequiel discovers how much he really needs Marbella. Marcelo warns Miky to stay away from Marisa and Nicole.

26.title: Marcelo decide luchar por el amor de Marisa
26.plot: Marcelo tells Marisa about his feelings for her and suggests they get back together so that Nicole can have a real family. When Marisa rejects him, Marcelo vows to win her back.

27.title: Miky siente celos de Marcelo
27.plot: Amaranta makes Marcelo believe that Eva did not die. Marbella and Ezequiel become friends again and she reveals the reason for canceling her wedding. Miky asks Marcelo to make Nicole happy.

28.title: Marcelo cree que su esposa está viva
28.plot: When Jaquie decides she does not want Brayan to be her representative, he breaks up with her. Marcelo suspects his wife Eva is not dead and begins an investigation. Jenny warns Marisa that she will fight for Miky.

29.title: Miky es el hombre con el que Marisa quiere estar toda su vida
29.plot: Marcelo expects that someone is try to extort money from him. Marisa tells Nena that Miky is the man with whom she would like to spend the rest of her life. Miky prefers to keep Marisa at arm's length.

30.title: Miky está convencido de casarse con Jenny
30.plot: Marisa, confused and left with doubts, asks Miky if he is sure that he wants to marry Jenny. The connection between Nicole and Marcelo strengthens every day.

31.title: Marisa se niega a darle una oportunidad a Marcelo
31.plot: Marcelo prepares a surprise for Marisa with Nicole's help and asks her to consider getting back together. Ezequiel, Tadeo and Brayan are confused for robbers and arrested.

32.title: Marcelo investiga si Eva murió
32.plot: Marcelo asks an investigator to find out whether or not Eva died with her father in a tragic accident. The news he receives from the investigation shocks Marcelo and makes him nervous.

33.title: Nicole descubre que Marisa está enamorada de Miky
33.plot: Marisa declares her love for Miky, leaving him confused and wondering if it's still a good idea to marry Jenny when he can't stop thinking about Marisa. Nicole tells Marisa she already knows about her feelings for Miky.

34.title: Marcelo quiere reconocer legalmente a Nicole
34.plot: Marisa decides to stay away from Miky once and for all. Lesly finds out Tino kissed Simona. Marcelo thinks it's finally time for Nicole to have his last name and asks Marisa to start legal proceedings.

35.title: Jenny invita a Marisa a su boda con Miky
35.plot: Marbella finds out her husband has a lover. Lesly breaks up with Tino. Jenny discovers Miky has been secretly visiting Marisa and decides to take advantage of the situation by inviting Marisa to their wedding.

36.title: Miky decide empezar una nueva vida lejos de Marisa
36.plot: Miky accepts his new life with Jenny, away from Marisa. When he is offered a job as a chauffeur that requires moving out of town, Nicole begs him not to go. Jenny has a bachelorette party.

37.title: Jenny no está segura de casarse
37.plot: Jenny advises Lesly to not let Tino go. When the wedding day arrives, Jenny does not believe Miky loves her enough and discovers she is not sure about getting married.

38.title: ¡Miky se casa con Jenny!
38.plot: After Jenny's momentary cold feet, Miky decides to marry her and leave behind his feelings for Marisa. La Nena warns Marisa that Amaranta could win over Marcelo if she doesn't put in a little extra effort.

39.title: Marcelo está dispuesto a todo por reconquistar a Marisa
39.plot: Ezequiel wants to get back together with Marbella, but Amanda does not want to let him go. Jenny and Miky return from their honeymoon. Marcelo shows Marisa that he will do anything to win her back.

40.title: Marcelo le pide una oportunidad a Marisa
40.plot: Miky assures Jenny that Marisa is no longer important to him. Marcelo surprises Marisa with his behavior, asking her to let him be by her side once again. Nicole sees Marisa and Marcelo kissing.

41.title: Miky desea tener un hijo con Jenny
41.plot: Nicole is surprised to catch her parents kissing, but Marisa tells her that what she witness was a misunderstanding. Miky believes it's time to settle down and become a father. Marbella discovers that Tino is Miky's brother.

42.title: Miky se entera que Tino es su hermano
42.plot: Nicole begins to use Marcelo's last name. Marbella cannot continue lying to Tino and, before he leaves, she tells him that Ramón is his biological father. Miky discovers that he has a brother.

43.title: Amaranta y Eva se unen para vengarse de Marcelo
43.plot: Tino is embarrassed by his mother's lies and refuses to return to Marbella's house. Lorenza demands Marisa stay away from Marcelo. Amaranta convinces Eva to help her get revenge on Marcelo.

44.title: Marcelo despierta los celos de Roque
44.plot: Marcelo faints at the office, causing Marisa to worry and want to take care of him. Roque is furious that Amaranta appears to be cheating on him with Marcelo.

45.title: Nicole está perdida
45.plot: Amaranta asks Miky to work with her on breaking up Marcelo and Marisa. Nicole and Santi skip school to enact their plan, but things quickly go awry.

46.title: Miky encuentra a Nicole
46.plot: Santi confesses Nicole's plan to unite her parents, but the plan went wrong and Nicole got lost. Marisa and Marcelo search for their daughter together, but it's Miky who ends up finding her.

47.title: Marisa le da una oportunidad a Marcelo
47.plot: Jenny explodes in anger when she overhears Miky talk about how his love for Marisa. Feeling rejected, Marisa decides to give Marcelo a chance.

48.title: Nicole y Marcelo sufren un terrible accidente
48.plot: Miky warns Marisa that Amaranta is interested in Marcelo. While on the way home, Marcelo passes out in the car with Nicole and causes a severe accident. Miky arrives to help them.

49.title: Amaranta se entera que Marisa tiene una relación con Marcelo
49.plot: Marcelo is treated after the accident he suffered with Nicole, while Miky takes care of telling Marisa. In the hospital Marisa confronts Amaranta and defends her relationship with Marcelo.

50.title: Marcelo se entera que tiene un tumor en la cabeza
50.plot: While in the hospital, tests indicate Marcelo has a brain tumor that could be very dangerous. Jenny y Miky spend a romantic weekend together.

51.title: Lesly acepta ser novia de Bruno
51.plot: When Nicole finds Eva's picture in Marcelo's things, he refuses to tell her anything about the mysterious woman in the photo. Bruno asks Lesly to be his girlfriend.

52.title: Tino se enfrenta con Miky
52.plot: After hearing Lesly talk about the love she feels for Bruno, Tino retaliates by confronting Miky about his marriage to Jenny. Miky promises he is prepared to do anything to make Jenny happy.

53.title: Amaranta no acepta que Marisa dirija la empresa de Marcelo
53.plot: Amaranta is desperate to get control of Marcelo's business and asks Eva to help her. After seeing Marisa, Miky tells Jenny that he will not accept the job in San Miguel.

54.title: Marcelo le hace creer a Marisa que le queda poco tiempo de vida
54.plot: Marcelo confronts Amaranta to find out what she was doing at Eva's house. The test results show that Marcelo has a benign tumor, but he decides to manipulate Marisa by telling her that he has cancer.

55.title: Jenny intenta salvar su matrimonio
55.plot: Marcelo asks Marisa to keep his illness a secret. Marbella is close to exposing Amanda. Jenny cannot convince Miky to fight for their marriage and decides to leave him.

56.title: Marisa está dispuesta a apoyar a Marcelo
56.plot: Marbella decides to turn her life around after seeing Ezequiel kissing Amanda. Jenny begs Miky not to get involved with Marisa. Marisa tries to convince Marcelo to get a second medical opinion.

57.title: Marcelo le pide a Marisa que se case con él
57.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

58.title: Miky le confiesa a Marbella que está enamorado de Marisa
58.plot: Marisa does not want to marry Marcelo because she loves Miky. Marbella becomes the victim of fraud. Miky accepts that he is in love with Marisa and can no longer continue playing house with Jenny.

59.title: Marisa le pide a Miky que luchen por su amor
59.plot: Marisa is secure in her decision to not marry Marcelo because she is completely in love with Miky. The pair vow to fight for their love, no matter the consequences. Miky decides to confess to Jenny that he does not love her.

60.title: Marisa acepta que Marcelo viva con ella
60.plot: Marcelo asks Marisa to let him live with her and Nicole for the limited time he has left to live. Despite how much he loves Marisa, Miky decides to fight for his marriage and makes plans to move away with Jenny.

61.title: Jenny le pone un alto a Marisa
61.plot: Nicole is angry with Miky after finding out he plans to move far away. Jenny tries to defend her marriage by attacking Marisa and warning her to never see Miky again.

62.title: Miky se despide del transporte escolar
62.plot: Marcelo uses his last resort to get Marisa to marry him. Miky leaves his job to fulfill his promise to leave Marisa and begin a new life with Jenny.

63.title: ¡Jenny sospecha que está embarazada!
63.plot: Marisa tells Nicole that Marcelo's illness is very serious. When Miky is just about to admit he still has strong feelings for Marisa, Jenny confesses that she might be pregnant.

64.title: Jenny decide separarse de Miky
64.plot: Once Jenny confirms that she is not pregnant, she decides that her relationship with Miky can no longer continue and separates from him. Lorenza discovers Amaranta's plans against Marisa and advises her friend to confront Amaranta.

65.title: ¡Marisa y Miky se reencuentran!
65.plot: Marisa confronts Amaranta about embezzlement. Jenny and Miky return from their failed attempt to recuperate their marriage. Marisa and Miky finally see each other again.

66.title: Marisa pierde el control de su auto y sufre un grave accidente
66.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

67.title: La vida de Marisa corre peligro
67.plot: After suffering a terrible car accident, Marisa is transported to the hospital and the doctors discover she is in serious danger of dying.

68.title: Marcelo culpa a Miky del accidente de Marisa
68.plot: Marisa does not respond to medical treatment and her condition is still life-threatening. Marcelo blames Miky for Marisa's accident. Lesly is expelled from college for cheating.

69.title: ¡Marisa despierta del coma!
69.plot: Nicole visits Marisa's hospital room, where she follows Miky's advice and tells her mother how much she loves and needs her. Marisa wakes from her coma with Nicole by her side. Lesly and Bruno run away from home.

70.title: Marcelo amenaza con matar a Miky
70.plot: Miky decides to fight for Marisa, but Marcelo threatens to kill him if he tries to get near her again. Miky sees Marisa and Marcelo ask Jeny to help separate them.

71.title: Jenny y Marcelo planean su venganza
71.plot: Jenny doesn't want Miky to be happy with Marisa and accepts Marcelo's proposition to get revenge on their exes. Eva trusts Amaranta's friendship, but she ends up being the one to betray her friend to Marcelo.

72.title: Eva se enfrenta a Marcelo
72.plot: Miky asks Marisa to be his girlfriend. Eva threatens to reveal the truth about Marcelo's past if he does not give her the money she needs. Marcelo refuses to lose Marisa and decides to take Nicole away from her.

73.title: Miky encuentra a Jenny y Marcelo juntos
73.plot: Eva and Amaranta suspect Marcelo's illness is yet another lie to manipulate Marisa. Miky investigates Marcelo's illness and finds Jenny kissing him.

74.title: Jenny está arrepentida de hacerle daño a Miky
74.plot: Marcelo confirms that Amaranta has always been Eva's accomplice. Jenny does not want to hurt Miky, but Marcelo convinces her to re-commit to her plan for revenge.

75.title: Marcelo amenaza a Marisa con quitarle a Nicole
75.plot: When Marcelo accuses Miky of mistreating Nicole, Marisa asks him to retract his statement. Instead, Marcelo threatens to take custody of Nicole and never let Marisa contact her daughter again. Lesly cuts Bruno out of her life for good.

76.title: Jenny sospecha que Marcelo no está enfermo
76.plot: Amaranta begins to lead Marcelo's company and her first decision is to fire Marisa and Lorenza. Jenny suspects Marcelo's is not truly terminally ill because he still looks so healthy.

77.title: Eva planea un encuentro con Marisa
77.plot: Eva wants to get to know Marisa better and introduces herself. Jealous of Marisa's home, Eva convinces her to help look for a house. Marisa slaps Amaranta for calling her a thief.

78.title: Miky demuestra que Marcelo no está enfermo
78.plot: Miky confronts Marcelo with proof that his illness is a lie to manipulate Marisa. Marcelo tells Nicole that he is not going to die and Marisa reprimands him for making their daughter suffer.

79.title: Marcelo peleará la custodia de Nicole
79.plot: Marcelo prepares to tell the court that Marisa is a danger to her daughter in a plot to get sole custody of Nicole. Simona discovers she is pregnant by Tino.

80.title: Marisa decide alejarse de Miky
80.plot: For Nicole's benefit and to avoid problems with Marcelo, Marisa decides to separate from Miky despite the great love she feels for him. Nicole recognizes Eva and gives evidence to Marisa.

81.title: Marisa se enfrenta con Marcelo por la custodia de Nicole
81.plot: Marisa accepts to go to a judge to fight for custody of Nicole. She warns Marcelo that she's tired of his betrayals and intends to prove his behavior makes him a danger to his daughter.

82.title: Marcelo pone a Nicole en contra de Marisa
82.plot: Marcelo manipulates Nicole into thinking her mother does not love her because of Miky and convinces her to live with him. Jenny doesn't want to follow Marcelo's plan anymore, but he threatens to kill her if she doesn't go along with it.

83.title: Marcelo corre a Amaranta de su empresa
83.plot: Jenny's testimony succeeds in prejudicing the judge against Marisa in court. Marcelo overhears a conversation between Amaranta and Eva, confirming his suspicions that they are plotting against him.

84.title: Nicole debe elegir con quien quiere vivir
84.plot: Olga confesses that Amaranta committed fraud to frame Marisa and Lorenza. Nicole is called before the judge and has to choose which of her parents she wants to live with full-time.

85.title: Marisa está a punto de perder la custodia de Nicole
85.plot: Nicole prefers to live with her mother, but Marcelo could win the judge's favor thanks to his lies. Marisa refuses to be separated from Nicole and decides to live in Marcelo's house to be near her daughter.

86.title: Marcelo secuestra a Nicole
86.plot: Jeny presents new evidence that shows that Marcelo manipulated the information and Eva warns that he is a danger to Nicole, with which Marisa wins the trial. Marcelo decides to take Nicole.

87.title: Capítulo Final: Marisa y Miky forman un nuevo hogar
87.plot: On their fourth attempt, Marbella and Ezequiel are finally husband and wife. Miky can not wait to propose to Marisa and start a new family with Nicole.

imdb.plot outline: The telenovela tells the story of Marisa and her 8-year-old daughter, Nicole, who live in Villahermosa with grandmother María Elena and nana Jaquie, but their lives change when a job opportunity for Marisa, in the Real Estate business, takes them to move to Mexico City.
imdb.title: Tenías que ser tú
plot: The telenovela tells the story of Marisa and her 8-year-old daughter, Nicole, who live in Villahermosa with grandmother María Elena and nana Jaquie, but their lives change when a job opportunity for Marisa, in the Real Estate business, takes them to move to Mexico City.
